alert.note: Alert for Western San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 01 at 8:59AM PST until December 01 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Northwest to north winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Western San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Western San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor
